#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
#define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b
 
int main()
{
int t; 
cin >> t;
while(t--) 
 {
 int x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4,sum=0,p,q,r,s;
 cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
 cin>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
 sum+=((x2-x1)*(y2-y1) + (x4-x3)*(y4-y3));
 p=max(x1,x3);
 q=max(y1,y3);
 r=min(x2,x4);
 s=min(y2,y4);
 if((r-p)>0 && (s-q)>0)
   sum-=((r-p)*(s-q));
 cout<<sum<<endl;
 }
return 0;
}
